name: Xiaomi ADB/Fastboot Tools 7.0.3
body:
### Changelog

* App Manager
  * Added YouTube Music and Google One
* ROM Downloader
  * Fixed self-clearing codename field
* Several UI improvements and fixes (courtesy of @Koalskiy)

**WARNING!**
Since version 6.9, XAFT requires [Java 11 or later](https://github.com/Szaki/XiaomiADBFastbootTools#faq--troubleshooting)!
If you see a JNI error when trying to launch the application, that means you have an older version of Java.

name: Xiaomi ADB/Fastboot Tools 7.0.2
body:
### Changelog

* App Manager
  * Added Content Service and Sogou Keyboard
* Improved error handling
* Updated libraries and Kotlin version

**WARNING!**
Since version 6.9, XAFT requires [Java 11 or later](https://github.com/Szaki/XiaomiADBFastbootTools#faq--troubleshooting)!
If you see a JNI error when trying to launch the application, that means you have an older version of Java.

name: Xiaomi ADB/Fastboot Tools 7.0.1
body:
### Changelog

* App Manager
  * Added Mi Calendar, Wallpaper Carousel, Frequent phrases, Power Detector, Battery & performance, QQ Browser, Mi Financial, SoterService and System Apps Updater
* Minor UI improvements
* Updated libraries and Kotlin version

**WARNING!**
Since version 6.9, XAFT requires [Java 11 or later](https://github.com/Szaki/XiaomiADBFastbootTools#faq--troubleshooting)!
If you see a JNI error when trying to launch the application, that means you have an older version of Java.

name: Xiaomi ADB/Fastboot Tools 7.0
body:
### Changelog

* App Manager
  * Added Mi Mover, Mi Browser, Kika Keyboard
* Decoupled ADB/Fastboot binaries from releases
  * No more OS-specific ZIPs, only the JAR is needed now!
    * The JAR automatically downloads the latest binaries on first launch
* Improved resource efficiency and UI responsiveness
* Fixed minor bugs and glitches
* Updated Kotlin to version 1.3.71

**WARNING!**
Since version 6.9, XAFT requires [Java 11 or later](https://github.com/Szaki/XiaomiADBFastbootTools#faq--troubleshooting)!
If you see a JNI error when trying to launch the application, that means you have an older version of Java.

name: Xiaomi ADB/Fastboot Tools 6.9.1
body:
### Changelog

* App Manager
  * Added Mi Share, Xiaomi Service Framework
* Fixed incorrect bootloader status reports in ADB mode
* Updated SDK Platform Tools to version 29.0.6
* Updated Kotlin to version 1.3.70


**WARNING!**
Since version 6.9, XAFT requires [Java 11 or later](https://github.com/Szaki/XiaomiADBFastbootTools#faq--troubleshooting)!
If you see a so called JNI error when trying to run the application, you have an older version of Java.

**For more information on downloads, please read the [front page](https://github.com/Szaki/XiaomiADBFastbootTools).**

name: Xiaomi ADB/Fastboot Tools 6.9
body:
### Changelog

* App Manager
  * Added Mi Health
* Significantly improved CPU efficiency
* Fixed Fastboot detection issues with legacy devices
* Updated Kotlin to version 1.3.61
* Updated Java bytecode to version 11

**WARNING!**
Henceforth, Java 8 is no longer supported so make sure you have [Java 11 or later](https://github.com/Szaki/XiaomiADBFastbootTools#faq--troubleshooting)!

**For more information on downloads, please read the [front page](https://github.com/Szaki/XiaomiADBFastbootTools).**

name: Xiaomi ADB/Fastboot Tools 6.8.1
body:
### Changelog

* Fixed a fatal error breaking Fastboot mode operations

**Changelog for 6.8**

* App Manager
    * Added apps to the default list
    * The default list now loads from the web when possible
        * Future versions will always have the latest revision - no update required!
* Improved version checking on startup
* Slightly improved efficiency

**Please check the [front page](https://github.com/Szaki/XiaomiADBFastbootTools) for more information on download options.**

name: Xiaomi ADB/Fastboot Tools 6.7.5
body:
### Changelog

* Improved CPU and memory efficiency
* Updated included ADB/Fastboot binaries to version 29.0.5

**Changelog for 6.7**

* App Manager
    * Removed MiSound from the default list
    * New, YAML-like syntax for adding apps to the list
        * `com.some.packagename: SomeAppName`
    * Made list additions persistent
        * XAFT will now remember the apps you've added to the list
* ROM Downloader
    * Improved responsiveness
    * Added Indonesia Stable as an option
* Flasher
    * Improved anti-rollback safeguard disabling
* Improved all-around efficiency and stability


**Please check the [front page](https://github.com/Szaki/XiaomiADBFastbootTools) for more information on download options.**

* Removed Developer ROMs from the ROM Downloader due to their discontinuation

* Updated Kotlin to 1.3.50

name: Xiaomi ADB/Fastboot Tools 6.5.1
body:
### Changelog

* Fixed a bug related to device detection
* Made the ROM Downloader module multithreaded so it doesn't block the UI

**Changelog for 6.5**

* Added support for system-wide installations of ADB and Fastboot
* Added File Manager support for older devices
* Improved the ROM Downloader module
* Major efficiency and speed improvements
* Minor UI updates
* Updated JavaFX library
* Updated Kotlin plugin

**Please check the [front page](https://github.com/Saki-EU/XiaomiADBFastbootTools) for more information on the new downloads.**

name: Xiaomi ADB/Fastboot Tools 6.4
body:
### Changelog

* Updated module: App Manager
    * **Disabler**: Disable system apps and services on demand
    * **Enabler**: Enable disabled system apps and services
    * Supports Second Space on MIUI
    * Improved parser for adding apps
* Fixed Status display encoding issues
* Fixed window size bug on KDE Plasma
* Slightly reduced file size

name: Xiaomi ADB/Fastboot Tools 6.3
body:

* Added apps to the Uninstaller/Reinstaller module
* Optimised device loading
* Updated Kotlin to 1.3.31

name: Xiaomi ADB/Fastboot Tools 6.2.5
body:
### Changelog

* Updated Kotlin to 1.3.30
* Stability improvements
* Code optimisations

**Changelog for 6.2**

* **New module**: **Screen resolution**
    * Tweak the screen resolution by overriding the width and height values
* The application's temporary directory now appears in the working directory
* Updated ADB and Fastboot to version 28.0.2
* Added UI dialogs for potential exceptions
* Uninstaller and Reinstaller updates
    * Expanded the list of apps
    * Added app grouping
    * Added legacy device support
    * Expanded options to add custom apps
* Added option to reset DPI defaults
* Added EEA, Russia and India Stable branches to the ROM Downloader module
* Minor UI changes

name: Xiaomi ADB/Fastboot Tools 6.1
body:
**Changelog:**

* **New module**: **Reinstaller**
    * Reinstall uninstalled system apps without factory resetting
* Added HybridAccessory to the Uninstaller module
* Minor memory optimisations

**Note**: Older devices don't support the new Uninstaller and Reinstaller modules so if these features don't seem to work, please [download the previous version (6.0.1)](https://github.com/Saki-EU/XiaomiADBFastbootTools/releases/download/6.0.1/XiaomiADBFastbootTools-6.0.1.jar). Fallback to the old Uninstaller for older devices will be added in an upcoming update.

* Added Mi Credit (IN) to the Uninstaller module

* Tweaked the UI to look better across all platforms
* Fixed a DPI module bug that broke the features of the Camera2 module

name: Xiaomi ADB/Fastboot Tools 4.4
body:
**First release written in Kotlin!**

**Changelog:**

* Added a progress indicator for uninstallations and flashing sequences
* Fixed a bug around bootloader detection in ADB mode
* Minor optimisations in code

name: Xiaomi ADB/Fastboot Tools 4.3.1
body:
**Changelog:**

* Added Mi Account to the Uninstaller module

**This is the last release written in Java. Following releases will be written in Kotlin.**

**Changelog:**

* Made the application more foolproof
* Optimised code project-wide
* Fixed device-dependent PAI package name in the Uninstaller module
* Fixed a bug in the Device properties module

name: Xiaomi ADB/Fastboot Tools 4.0.3
body:
**Changelog:**

* Optimised Fastboot ROM flashing

name: Xiaomi ADB/Fastboot Tools 4.0.2
body:
**Changelog:**

* The progress bar has been made determinate while flashing Fastboot ROMs
* Fixed a bug regarding script names in ROM packages

name: Xiaomi ADB/Fastboot Tools 4.0.1
body:
**Changelog:**

* Updated ADB and Fastboot to ver. 28.0.1

name: Xiaomi ADB/Fastboot Tools 4.0.0
body:
**Changelog:**

* **New feature**: The Flasher can now flash Fastboot ROMs in Fastboot mode
* The Xiaomi Service Framework has been added to the Debloater
* A progress bar has been placed above the status display
* The temp folder is now hidden
* Fixed codename reading bug in ADB mode
* Under the hood improvements
  * Improved startup times
  * Improved code distribution among classes
  * Improved efficiency

name: Xiaomi ADB/Fastboot Tools 3.1.1
body:
**Changelog:**

* The applications opens considerably faster than before

name: Xiaomi ADB/Fastboot Tools 3.1.0
body:
**Changelog:**

* Fixed fastboot issues on macOS 10.13.6
* Updated the app selection of the Debloater
* Optimised code

name: Xiaomi ADB/Fastboot Tools 3.0.4
body:
**Changelog:**

* An issue in the Flasher caused by spaces in a path has been fixed
* Added `Games` to the Debloater

name: Xiaomi ADB/Fastboot Tools 3.0.2
body:
**Changelog:**

* Fastboot and ADB are now included with the program on Linux
* Fixed Mac issues

name: Xiaomi ADB/Fastboot Tools 3.0.0
body:
**Changelog:**

**First release in Java!**

* All-new UI, built with JavaFX
  * Debloater
    * The interface has been incorporated in the main window
    * It no longer lists apps for uninstallation which are not installed on the device
  * Rebooter
    * New interface in the top menu, replaces the ADB and Fastboot Rebooter interfaces
    * Detects which mode the device's connected in
  * Camera2
    * Added button to reboot to recovery
    * Added buttons for EIS toggling
    * Any interaction checks if the device is in recovery mode
  * Flasher (formerly Image Flasher)
    * Disable anti-rollback protection in fastboot mode at the press of a button
    * Flash any file to any partition
    * Boot device to any image
    * New option: automatically boot to `recovery` after it is flashed

The original C# project can be found [here](https://github.com/Saki-EU/XiaomiADBFastbootTools-Win32).
